body_html:
Unfortunately, without the original author of the beam search code having provided a clear license in their original gist/github, we cannot accept code except from that author.

That said, the attention wrapper looks like it's original (is it? if not, do you have details about the original license?) So if you want, you can submit that on its own with corresponding unit tests for review. Please look at some other code and unit tests to ensure you conform to code and documentation guidelines.

Thanks!

body:
Unfortunately, without the original author of the beam search code having provided a clear license in their original gist/github, we cannot accept code except from that author.

That said, the attention wrapper looks like it's original (is it?  if not, do you have details about the original license?)  So if you want, you can submit that on its own with corresponding unit tests for review.  Please look at some other code and unit tests to ensure you conform to code and documentation guidelines.

Thanks!
